T02TD2255E:177b-3: rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba /
T02TD2255E:177b-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2255E:177b-5: dngos po kun gyis bdag gus pas //
T02TD2255E:177b-6: dang po bla ma mchog phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2255E:177b-7: slar yang ri khrod pa de bzhin //
T02TD2255E:177b-8: dgyes pa'i rdo rje ma rgyud du //
T02TD2255E:177b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas spangs pa gang //
T02TD2255E:177b-10: rnam bshad phyag na rigs ldan pas //
T02TD2255E:177b-11: las kyi phyag rgya sogs sgrub thabs //
T02TD2255E:177b-12: slob ma yis ni rtogs phyir bri //
T02TD2255E:177b-13: sangs rgyas kun bdag sdom pa ni //
T02TD2255E:177b-14: ae wam rnam par rab tu gnas //
T02TD2255E:177b-15: yang dag dbang bskur zhes bya ba //
T02TD2255E:177b-16: gcig pu'i rnam pa bde chen po //
T02TD2255E:177b-17: bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste //
T02TD2255E:177b-18: gsang ba mchog ni gnyis pa yin ;
T02TD2255E:177b-19: / shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste //
T02TD2255E:177b-20: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
T02TD2255E:177b-21: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
T02TD2255E:177b-22: dbus su wam gis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2255E:177b-23: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
T02TD2255E:177b-24: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / de las dga' ba skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2255E:177b-25: skad cig dbye ba tha dad pas //
T02TD2255E:177b-26: skad cig ye shes bde ye shes /
T02TD2255E:177b-27: ae wam rnam par rab tu gnas //
T02TD2255E:177b-28: rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin //
T02TD2255E:177b-29: rnam nyed de ni mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD2255E:177b-30: skad cig ma bzhi yang dag rtogs //
T02TD2255E:177b-32: sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs brjod /
T02TD2255E:177b-34: rnam par smin pa de las bzlog / bde ba'i ye shes za ba'o //
T02TD2255E:177b-35: rnam par nyed pa dpyod par brjod //
T02TD2255E:177b-36: bdag gis bde ba spyad do zhes //
T02TD2255E:177b-37: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan //
T02TD2255E:177b-38: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
T02TD2255E:177b-39: dang por dga' ba rnam sna tshogs //
T02TD2255E:177b-40: mchog tu dga' ba rnam par smin //
T02TD2255E:177b-41: dga' bral dga' ba rnam par nyed //
T02TD2255E:177b-42: lhan cig skyes dga' mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD2255E:177b-43: dga' ba dang po 'gro ba nyid //
T02TD2255E:177b-44: mchog tu dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid //
T02TD2255E:177b-45: dga' bral dga' ba 'gro ba nyid //
T02TD2255E:177b-46: lhan cig skyes pa gsum mi dmigs //
T02TD2255E:177b-47: padma'i nam mkha' rdo rje ze'u 'bru dag / rdo rje skyil krung gis mnan gnas dag tu //
T02TD2255E:177b-48: sems ni nor bu'i nang du chud pas blta //
T02TD2255E:177b-49: ye shes gang skyes ye shes brjod med gzugs //
T02TD2255E:177b-50: shes rab bcu drug lon pa la //
T02TD2255E:177b-51: lag pa gnyis kyis dam 'khyud nas //
T02TD2255E:177b-52: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD2255E:177b-53: slob dpon dbang du bzhed pa yin //
T02TD2255E:177b-54: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang //
T02TD2255E:177b-55: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yang //
T02TD2255E:177b-56: dbang bzhi yi ni grangs kyis kyang //
T02TD2255E:177b-57: dga' ba la sogs rim bzhin shes //
T02TD2255E:178a-2: lta ba de bzhin gsang ba'i dbang //
T02TD2255E:178a-3: 'khyud pa shes rab ye shes te //
T02TD2255E:178a-4: de yang gnyis kyis gnyis sprod rgyud //
T02TD2255E:178a-5: sems can rnams kyi dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD2255E:178a-6: dbang bskur rnam pa bzhi ru bshad //
T02TD2255E:178a-7: blugs shing bkrus pa 'di yis ni //
T02TD2255E:178a-8: dbang bskur zhes bya mngon par brjod //
T02TD2255E:178a-9: sna tshogs spang ba'i skad cig la //
T02TD2255E:178a-10: mchog tu dga' ba yang dag rnyed //
T02TD2255E:178a-11: ston pas bka' stsal sems dpa' che //
T02TD2255E:178a-12: bde ba chen po yang dag gzugs //
T02TD2255E:178a-13: ji srid byang chub ma thob par //
T02TD2255E:178a-14: sems can don gyi rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD2255E:178a-15: 'di de nyid kyis ye shes che //
T02TD2255E:178a-16: lus kun la ni rnam par gnas //
T02TD2255E:178a-17: byang chub sems ni zla bar gyur //
T02TD2255E:178a-18: bco lnga'i cha'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2255E:178a-19: a'a li'i gzugs kyis bde chen po //
T02TD2255E:178a-20: rnal 'byor ma ni de yi cha //
T02TD2255E:178a-21: don gyi bya ba mi byed phyir //
T02TD2255E:178a-22: thams cad mtha' ni 'bad pas spangs //
T02TD2255E:178a-23: bcu drug gi ni cha ma yin //
T02TD2255E:178a-24: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo gang //
T02TD2255E:178a-25: dga' bral dang po mchog gi mtha' //
T02TD2255E:178a-26: stong las stong nyid he ru ka / shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02TD2255E:178a-27: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa'o //
T02TD2255E:178a-28: ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid //
T02TD2255E:178a-29: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa //
T02TD2255E:178a-30: khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2255E:178a-31: de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod //
T02TD2255E:178a-32: 'di ni gcig dang du ma bral //
T02TD2255E:178a-33: skad cig gcig la mchog tu dga' //
T02TD2255E:178a-34: gnyis su med dang gnyis kyi tshul //
T02TD2255E:178a-35: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso //
T02TD2255E:178a-36: brtan dang g-yo ba khyab ste gnas //
T02TD2255E:178a-37: sgyu ma'i gzugs ni nyid du snang //
T02TD2255E:178a-39: de ni rtag tu nges par grol //
T02TD2255E:178a-40: dkyil ni snying por brjod pa ste //
T02TD2255E:178a-41: byang chub sems ni bde chen por //
T02TD2255E:178a-42: len par byed pas dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD2255E:178a-44: 'khor lo'i tshogs ni nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD2255E:178a-45: yul la sogs pa rnam spyod pa'o //
T02TD2255E:178a-46: rdo rje padma sbyor ba'i thabs //
T02TD2255E:178a-47: de yi bde ba rtogs par byed //
T02TD2255E:178a-48: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //
T02TD2255E:178a-49: dbus su bsgom par bya ba ni //
T02TD2255E:178a-51: lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba bsam //
T02TD2255E:178a-52: mkha' dbyings zhes bya'i padma la //
T02TD2255E:178a-53: bha ga 'dir ni ye shes brjod //
T02TD2255E:178a-55: de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod //
T02TD2255E:178a-56: phyag rgya chen po dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2255E:178a-57: ji ltar bde ba chen po yi //
T02TD2255E:178a-58: de nyid 'di yi mthu stobs kyis //
T02TD2255E:178a-60: bde ba nag po bde ba ser //
T02TD2255E:178a-61: bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar //
T02TD2255E:178a-62: bde ba ljang gu bde ba sngo //
T02TD2255E:178b-0: bde ba @178b rgyu dang mi rgyu kun //
T02TD2255E:178b-1: bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs //
T02TD2255E:178b-2: de bzhin kun du ru skyes bde //
T02TD2255E:178b-3: bde ba dngos dang dngos med bde //
T02TD2255E:178b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen brjod //
T02TD2255E:178b-5: dngos dang dngos med gnyis kyang ngo //
T02TD2255E:178b-6: dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga //
T02TD2255E:178b-7: le los nye bar bcom pa dang //
T02TD2255E:178b-8: rmongs pa rnams kyis nga mi shes //
T02TD2255E:178b-9: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga mchog / bde ba can nang gnas te //
T02TD2255E:178b-10: ae yi cha byad kyi ni gzugs //
T02TD2255E:178b-11: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
T02TD2255E:178b-12: rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga //
T02TD2255E:178b-13: 'gro ba ston pa bsgrub bya nga //
T02TD2255E:178b-15: lhan cig skyes gzhan rang bzhin nga //
T02TD2255E:178b-16: mchog mtha' bral ba dang po ste //
T02TD2255E:178b-17: bolla ka ko la sbyor bas //
T02TD2255E:178b-18: reg pa las ni sra ba'i rdzas //
T02TD2255E:178b-19: sa ni de las skyes par 'gyur //
T02TD2255E:178b-20: byang chub sems ni zhu ba las //
T02TD2255E:178b-21: chu yi khams su yang ni 'byung //
T02TD2255E:178b-22: bskyod pa las ni me yin te //
T02TD2255E:178b-23: 'gro ba rlung du rab tu grags //
T02TD2255E:178b-24: bde ba yang ni nam mkha'i khams //
T02TD2255E:178b-25: lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2255E:178b-26: de phyir bde ba de nyid min //
T02TD2255E:178b-27: gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba //
T02TD2255E:178b-28: lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo gang //
T02TD2255E:178b-29: lhan cig skyes par nges par bshad //
T02TD2255E:178b-30: las kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o //
T02TD2255E:178b-31: rang bzhin nyid ni ma skyes na //
T02TD2255E:178b-32: bden pa ma yin brdzun pa min //
T02TD2255E:178b-33: thams cad chu zla lta bu de //
T02TD2255E:178b-38: skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa las glo bur du me mngon sum du 'byung ste /
T02TD2255E:178b-39: me de ni gtsub shing la yang mi gnas /
T02TD2255E:178b-41: skyes bu'i lag pa la yang ma yin te /
T02TD2255E:178b-42: rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na gcig la yang gnas pa med do //
T02TD2255E:178b-43: me de yang bden pa yang ma yin brdzun pa yang ma yin te /
T02TD2255E:178b-44: de ltar chos thams cad yid la gyis shig / de ltar 'khor ba de nyid do //
T02TD2255E:178b-45: 'khor ba ma rtogs gzhan du ni //
T02TD2255E:178b-46: mya ngan 'das pa mi shes so //
T02TD2255E:178b-47: 'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs //
T02TD2255E:178b-48: 'khor ba tshor ba la sogs te //
T02TD2255E:178b-49: 'khor ba dbang po rnams nyid do //
T02TD2255E:178b-50: 'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa //
T02TD2255E:178b-52: rmongs pas 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid //
T02TD2255E:178b-53: 'khor ba gti mug med pa dag / byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das //
T02TD2255E:178b-54: don dam kun rdzob rang bzhin no //
T02TD2255E:178b-55: 'dod chags zhe sdang med cing gti mug med //
T02TD2255E:178b-56: phrag dog med cing ser sna med //
T02TD2255E:178b-57: nga rgyal med cing lta ba med //
T02TD2255E:179a-2: sna tshogs lhan cig skyes pa brlabs bral ba //
T02TD2255E:179a-3: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod //
T02TD2255E:179a-4: thams cad gcig pa'i sdom pa ni //
T02TD2255E:179a-6: phyag rgya rgyu dang rnam par bral //
T02TD2255E:179a-7: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02TD2255E:179a-8: byang chub sems zhes bya bar brjod //
T02TD2255E:179a-9: chos kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'o //
T02TD2255E:179a-10: sngags bzlas dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med //
T02TD2255E:179a-11: dkyil 'khor med cing dkyil 'khor ba yang med //
T02TD2255E:179a-12: de ni sngags bzlas dka' thub sbyin sreg yin //
T02TD2255E:179a-13: de ni dkyil 'khor ba dang dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02TD2255E:179a-14: mnyam pa nyid du sems ni 'dus pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2255E:179a-15: dam pa'i dga' ba dngos dang dngos med dngos por ldan ba med ;
T02TD2255E:179a-16: / lus po med cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin pa med //
T02TD2255E:179a-17: sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshang dang gci ba med //
T02TD2255E:179a-18: mi gtsang ba dang rmongs med gtsang spra dag pa med //
T02TD2255E:179a-19: rang bzhin gzugs med lta ba med //
T02TD2255E:179a-20: sgra med pas na nyan pa med //
T02TD2255E:179a-21: dri yang med cing snom pa med //
T02TD2255E:179a-22: ro med myong ba bo yang med //
T02TD2255E:179a-23: reg bya med cing reg pa med ;
T02TD2255E:179a-24: / sems med sems las byung ba med //
T02TD2255E:179a-25: dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
T02TD2255E:179a-26: slar yang de bzhin nyid gshegs pa'o //
T02TD2255E:179a-27: shes rab rigs pa 'di yis ni //
T02TD2255E:179a-28: de bzhin gshegs par mngon par brjod //
T02TD2255E:179a-29: sgom pa po dang bsgom bya med //
T02TD2255E:179a-30: lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin //
T02TD2255E:179a-31: spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2255E:179a-32: sngags dang lha dag gnas pa dag / rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang //
T02TD2255E:179a-34: tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba kun //
T02TD2255E:179a-35: rnam par sad dang de bzhin brjod //
T02TD2255E:179a-36: tshangs pa mya ngan 'das sangs rgyas //
T02TD2255E:179a-38: rtag tu dge bas zhi ba ste //
T02TD2255E:179a-39: thams cad bdag nyid gnas pa kun //
T02TD2255E:179a-40: rang rig pa yi ye shes 'di //
T02TD2255E:179a-41: ngag gi spyod yul lam las 'das //
T02TD2255E:179a-42: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig pa gang //
T02TD2255E:179a-43: kun mkhyen ye shes de rang bzhin //
T02TD2255E:179a-44: ji ltar pa las bde thob pa //
T02TD2255E:179a-45: de yi bde ba rang gis spyod //
T02TD2255E:179a-47: de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod //
T02TD2255E:179a-48: sems can sangs rgyas gcig pa las //
T02TD2255E:179a-49: 'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs //
T02TD2255E:179a-50: de dag spangs la lha nyid kyis //
T02TD2255E:179a-51: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
T02TD2255E:179a-52: de ltar de nyid bden brdzun min //
T02TD2255E:179a-53: gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes //
T02TD2255E:179a-54: gang las kyang ni rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02TD2255E:179a-55: bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa las //
T02TD2255E:179b-0: rang gis shes bya bsod nams @179b kyis ;
T02TD2255E:179b-1: / phyag rgya chen po bstan pa'o //
T02TD2255E:179b-2: mi shes pa yi 'jig rten gang //
T02TD2255E:179b-3: btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur //
T02TD2255E:179b-4: gti mug rnam spangs de nyid shes //
T02TD2255E:179b-5: de yis mya ngan yongs gcod 'gyur //
T02TD2255E:179b-6: de bzhin thar pa'i thabs shes pa //
T02TD2255E:179b-7: dgyes pa rdo rje shes byas nas //
T02TD2255E:179b-8: ma rig sogs pas gzung mi nus //
T02TD2255E:179b-9: gti mug la sogs kyis mi 'ching //
T02TD2255E:179b-10: rang rig gis ni yang dag rtog / sangs rgyas ma yin sems can med //
T02TD2255E:179b-11: dmyal ba yi dags byol song dang //
T02TD2255E:179b-12: lha dang lha min mi rnams dang //
T02TD2255E:179b-13: bshang gci'i srin bu la sogs pa //
T02TD2255E:179b-14: rtag tu bde ba'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD2255E:179b-15: lha dang lha ma yin gyis kyang //
T02TD2255E:179b-16: de ltar bde ba mi shes so //
T02TD2255E:179b-17: 'jig rten khams ni gang nas kyang //
T02TD2255E:179b-18: gzhan du sangs rgyas mi rnyed de //
T02TD2255E:179b-19: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin //
T02TD2255E:179b-20: sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med //
T02TD2255E:179b-21: gdol pa smyig mkhan la sogs pa //
T02TD2255E:179b-22: gsod pa don du sems pa rnams //
T02TD2255E:179b-23: de yang dgyes rdor rje shes na //
T02TD2255E:179b-25: byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pas //
T02TD2255E:179b-26: bgrod pa 'di mi shes pa yin //
T02TD2255E:179b-27: rmongs pa de ni 'khor ba ste //
T02TD2255E:179b-28: 'gro drug srid pa'i btson rar chud //
T02TD2255E:179b-29: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //
T02TD2255E:179b-30: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i thabs rnyed pa //
T02TD2255E:179b-31: gang zhig yul rnams rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD2255E:179b-33: dngos po'i 'ching bas bcings ba ni //
T02TD2255E:179b-34: de yongs shes bas grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2255E:179b-35: dngos po med pa yongs shes pas //
T02TD2255E:179b-36: dngos po bsam med shes rab can //
T02TD2255E:179b-37: dngos po bsgom pa pa yongs shes bya //
T02TD2255E:179b-38: de lta he ru ka bsgom pa //
T02TD2255E:179b-39: ye shes chen po lus la gnas //
T02TD2255E:179b-40: rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs //
T02TD2255E:179b-41: dngos po kun la khyab pa ste //
T02TD2255E:179b-42: lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min //
T02TD2255E:179b-43: chos 'byung las skyes ye shes yin //
T02TD2255E:179b-44: mkha' mnyam de yi thabs dang ldan //
T02TD2255E:179b-45: de las 'jig rten gsum po skyed //
T02TD2255E:179b-46: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin te //
T02TD2255E:179b-47: dman dang 'bring po mchog dang ni //
T02TD2255E:179b-48: gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams ni //
T02TD2255E:179b-49: de dag thams cad mnyam nyid du //
T02TD2255E:179b-50: de nyid bsgom pas blta bar bya //
T02TD2255E:179b-51: dman pa phra ba'i dngos po ste //
T02TD2255E:179b-52: mchog ni srid par brjod pa yin ;
T02TD2255E:179b-53: /'bring po gnyis la spangs pa las //
T02TD2255E:179b-54: gzhan rnams shes pa'i dbang po drug / gang rnams de rnams g-yo dang brtan //
T02TD2255E:179b-55: mnyam pa mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2255E:179b-56: ro mnyam de nyid bsgom par bya //
T02TD2255E:179b-57: mnyam pa mtshungs par brjod pa ste //
T02TD2255E:179b-58: de yi 'khor lo ror bshad do //
T02TD2255E:179b-59: ro mnyam pa yi ngo bo ru //
T02TD2255E:180a-2: 'gro ba thams cad nga las skyes //
T02TD2255E:180a-3: nga las gnas gsum po yang byung //
T02TD2255E:180a-4: nga yis 'di dag thams cad khyab //
T02TD2255E:180a-5: nga las gzhan pa'i 'gro ma mthong //
T02TD2255E:180a-6: de ltar nges shes rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD2255E:180a-7: shin tu mnyam gzhag gang goms na //
T02TD2255E:180a-8: bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang ;
T02TD2255E:180a-10: yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang //
T02TD2255E:180a-11: rab tu rgyas par smra ba rnams //
T02TD2255E:180a-12: de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2255E:180a-13: he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas //
T02TD2255E:180a-14: bza' dang btung dang de bzhin khrus //
T02TD2255E:180a-15: 'gro ba'am nyal bas bsam par bya //
T02TD2255E:180a-16: de rnyed de ni rgyun mi 'chad //
T02TD2255E:180a-17: phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pa //
T02TD2255E:180a-18: gang phyir brtan dang g-yo ba'i dngos //
T02TD2255E:180a-19: rtsva lcug 'khri shing la sogs pa //
T02TD2255E:180a-20: bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las //
T02TD2255E:180a-21: dam pa'i de nyid nges par bsgom //
T02TD2255E:180a-22: rang rig pa yis bdag nyid dag / dag pa gzhan gyis rnam mi grol //
T02TD2255E:180a-23: yul rnams dag pa'i rang bzhin pas ;
T02TD2255E:180a-24: / rang rig pa yi bde ba mchog / gzugs sogs yul dang gzhan dag kyang //
T02TD2255E:180a-25: rnal 'byor pa la gang snang pa //
T02TD2255E:180a-26: de kun dag pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2255E:180a-27: 'gro ba sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD2255E:180a-28: gang dang gang gis 'jig rten bcings //
T02TD2255E:180a-29: de yis bcings pa las grol 'gyur //
T02TD2255E:180a-30: de nyid shes pas 'jig rten grol //
T02TD2255E:180a-31: de nyid rnam spangs grol ba min //
T02TD2255E:180a-32: de phyir gzugs med sgra dri med //
T02TD2255E:180a-33: ro med sems med rnam par dag / reg med chos med rnam par grol //
T02TD2255E:180a-34: dag pa'i rang bzhin 'gro bas shes //
T02TD2255E:180a-35: dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis //
T02TD2255E:180a-36: skye bo thams cad 'chi ba ste //
T02TD2255E:180a-37: dug gi de nyid shes pa des //
T02TD2255E:180a-38: dug gis dug ni 'joms par byed //
T02TD2255E:180a-39: ji ltar rlung gis bzung de la //
T02TD2255E:180a-40: ma sha'i bza' ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD2255E:180a-41: rlung gis rlung ni 'joms byed de //
T02TD2255E:180a-42: bzlog pa'i sman du blta bar bya //
T02TD2255E:180a-43: srid pa nyid kyis srid dag byed //
T02TD2255E:180a-44: rnam rtog so sor rtog pa yin //
T02TD2255E:180a-45: ji ltar rna bar chu blugs pa //
T02TD2255E:180a-46: chu gzhan gyis ni dbyung bar bya //
T02TD2255E:180a-47: de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang //
T02TD2255E:180a-48: rnam par nges par sbyong bar byed //
T02TD2255E:180a-49: ji ltar me yis tshig pa la //
T02TD2255E:180a-50: slar yang me yis gdung bar bya //
T02TD2255E:180a-51: de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa //
T02TD2255E:180a-52: 'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya //
T02TD2255E:180a-53: skye bo mi bzad pa yi las //
T02TD2255E:180b-0: thabs dang bcas na de @180b nyid kyis //
T02TD2255E:180b-3: 'dod chags kyis ni rnam par grol //
T02TD2255E:180b-4: bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di lta bu //
T02TD2255E:180b-5: sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes //
T02TD2255E:180b-6: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'o //
T02TD2255E:180b-7: las kyi phyag rgya la sogs ldan //
T02TD2255E:180b-8: rdo rje tshig ni btu byas pa //
T02TD2255E:180b-9: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa //
T02TD2255E:180b-10: de yis 'jig rten rdor 'dzin shog / rdo rje slob dpon badzra p'a ni'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdo rje'i tshig rdzogs so /
T02TD2255E:180b-12: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
T02TD2255E:180b-13: lo ts'a ba mtshur ston dge slong dzny'a na a'a ka ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
